verses.verse: וַיַּבְדֵּ֣ל <S%H914><s%> separated דָּוִיד֩ <S%H1732><s%> Moreover David וְשָׂרֵ֨י <S%H8269><s%> and the captains הַצָּבָ֜א <S%H6635><s%> of the host לַעֲבֹדָ֗ה <S%H5656><s%> to the service לִבְנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> of the sons אָסָף֙ <S%H623><s%> of Asaph וְהֵימָ֣ן <S%H1968><s%> and of Heman וִֽידוּת֔וּן <S%H3038><s%> and of Jeduthun [הַנְּבִּיאִים כ] (הַֽנִּבְּאִ֛ים <S%H5030><s%> prophecy ק) בְּכִנֹּר֥וֹת <S%H3658><s%> with harps בִּנְבָלִ֖ים <S%H5035><s%> with psalteries וּבִמְצִלְתָּ֑יִם <S%H4700><s%> and with cymbals וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> become מִסְפָּרָ֔ם <S%H4557><s%> and the number אַנְשֵׁ֥י <S%H376><s%> of those מְלָאכָ֖ה <S%H4399><s%> performed לַעֲבֹדָתָֽם׃ <S%H5656><s%> according to their service

לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> Of the sons אָסָ֗ף <S%H623><s%> of Asaph זַכּ֧וּר <S%H2139><s%> Zaccur וְיוֹסֵ֛ף <S%H3130><s%> and Joseph וּנְתַנְיָ֥ה <S%H5418><s%> and Nethaniah וַאֲשַׂרְאֵ֖לָה <S%H841><s%> and Asarelah בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the sons אָסָ֑ף <S%H623><s%> of Asaph עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> under יַד־ <S%H3027><s%> under the hands אָסָ֔ף <S%H623><s%> of Asaph הַנִּבָּ֖א <S%H5012><s%> which prophesied עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> under יְדֵ֥י <S%H3027><s%> according to the order הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> of the king

לִידוּת֑וּן <S%H3038><s%> Of Jeduthun בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the sons יְדוּת֡וּן <S%H3038><s%> of Jeduthun גְּדַלְיָ֡הוּ <S%H1436><s%> Gedaliah וּצְרִ֡י <S%H6874><s%> and Zeri וִֽ֠ישַׁעְיָהוּ <S%H3470><s%> and Jeshaiah חֲשַׁבְיָ֨הוּ <S%H2811><s%> Hashabiah וּמַתִּתְיָ֜הוּ <S%H4993><s%> and Mattithiah שִׁשָּׁ֗ה <S%H8337><s%> six עַל֩ <S%H5921><s%> under יְדֵ֨י <S%H3027><s%> under the hands אֲבִיהֶ֤ם <S%H1><s%> of their father יְדוּתוּן֙ <S%H3038><s%> Jeduthun בַּכִּנּ֔וֹר <S%H3658><s%> with a harp הַנִּבָּ֕א <S%H5012><s%> who prophesied עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> under הֹד֥וֹת <S%H3034><s%> to give thanks וְהַלֵּ֖ל <S%H1984><s%> and to praise לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD ס

לְהֵימָ֑ן <S%H1968><s%> Of Heman בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the sons הֵימָ֡ן <S%H1968><s%> of Heman בֻּקִּיָּ֡הוּ <S%H1232><s%> Bukkiah מַתַּנְיָ֡הוּ <S%H4983><s%> Mattaniah עֻ֠זִּיאֵל <S%H5816><s%> Uzziel שְׁבוּאֵ֨ל <S%H7619><s%> Shebuel וִֽירִימ֜וֹת <S%H3406><s%> and Jerimoth חֲנַנְיָ֣ה <S%H2608><s%> Hananiah חֲנָ֗נִי <S%H2607><s%> Hanani אֱלִיאָ֤תָה <S%H448><s%> Eliathah גִדַּ֙לְתִּי֙ <S%H1437><s%> Giddalti וְרֹמַ֣מְתִּי עֶ֔זֶר <S%H7320><s%> and Romamtiezer יָשְׁבְּקָ֣שָׁה <S%H3436><s%> Joshbekashah מַלּ֔וֹתִי <S%H4413><s%> Mallothi הוֹתִ֖יר <S%H1956><s%> Hothir מַחֲזִיאֽוֹת׃ <S%H4238><s%> [and] Mahazioth

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All אֵ֨לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these בָנִ֜ים <S%H1121><s%> All these [were] the sons לְהֵימָ֗ן <S%H1968><s%> of Heman חֹזֵ֥ה <S%H2374><s%> seer הַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king's בְּדִבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> in the words הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> of God לְהָרִ֣ים <S%H7311><s%> to lift up קָ֑רֶן <S%H7161><s%> the horn וַיִּתֵּ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> gave הָאֱלֹהִ֜ים <S%H430><s%> And God לְהֵימָ֗ן <S%H1968><s%> to Heman בָּנִ֛ים <S%H1121><s%> sons אַרְבָּעָ֥ה <S%H702><s%> four עָשָׂ֖ר <S%H6240><s%> teen וּבָנ֥וֹת <S%H1323><s%> daughters שָׁלֽוֹשׁ׃ <S%H7969><s%> and three

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All אֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> were under יְדֵי֩ <S%H3027><s%> All these [were] under the hands אֲבִיהֶ֨ם <S%H1><s%> of their father בַּשִּׁ֜יר <S%H7892><s%> for song בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> [in] the house יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בִּמְצִלְתַּ֙יִם֙ <S%H4700><s%> with cymbals נְבָלִ֣ים <S%H5035><s%> psalteries וְכִנֹּר֔וֹת <S%H3658><s%> and harps לַעֲבֹדַ֖ת <S%H5656><s%> for the service בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> of God עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> under יְדֵ֣י <S%H3027><s%> order הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> according to the king's ס אָסָ֥ף <S%H623><s%> to Asaph וִידוּת֖וּן <S%H3038><s%> Jeduthun וְהֵימָֽן׃ <S%H1968><s%> and Heman

וַיְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> become מִסְפָּרָם֙ <S%H4557><s%> So the number עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with אֲחֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H251><s%> of them with their brethren מְלֻמְּדֵי־ <S%H3925><s%> that were instructed שִׁ֖יר <S%H7892><s%> in the songs לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> that הַ֨מֵּבִ֔ין <S%H995><s%> [even] all that were cunning מָאתַ֖יִם <S%H3967><s%> was two hundred שְׁמוֹנִ֥ים <S%H8084><s%> fourscore וּשְׁמוֹנָֽה׃ <S%H8083><s%> and eight

וַיַּפִּ֜ילוּ <S%H5307><s%> And they cast גּוֹרָל֣וֹת <S%H1486><s%> lots מִשְׁמֶ֗רֶת <S%H4931><s%> ward לְעֻמַּת֙ <S%H5980><s%> against כַּקָּטֹ֣ן <S%H6996><s%> [ward] as well the small כַּגָּד֔וֹל <S%H1419><s%> as the great מֵבִ֖ין <S%H995><s%> the teacher עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> accompanying תַּלְמִֽיד׃ <S%H8527><s%> as the scholar פ

וַיֵּצֵ֞א <S%H3318><s%> came forth הַגּוֹרָ֧ל <S%H1486><s%> lot הָרִאשׁ֛וֹן <S%H7223><s%> Now the first לְאָסָ֖ף <S%H623><s%> for Asaph לְיוֹסֵ֑ף <S%H3130><s%> to Joseph גְּדַלְיָ֙הוּ֙ <S%H1436><s%> to Gedaliah הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <S%H8145><s%> the second הֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> he וְאֶחָ֥יו <S%H251><s%> who with his brethren וּבָנָ֖יו <S%H1121><s%> and sons שְׁנֵ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָֽׂר׃ <S%H6240><s%> ten

הַשְּׁלִשִׁ֣י <S%H7992><s%> The third זַכּ֔וּר <S%H2139><s%> to Zaccur בָּנָ֥יו <S%H1121><s%> [he] his sons וְאֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> and his brethren שְׁנֵ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָֽׂר׃ <S%H6240><s%> ten

הָרְבִיעִי֙ <S%H7243><s%> The fourth לַיִּצְרִ֔י <S%H3339><s%> to Izri בָּנָ֥יו <S%H1121><s%> [he] his sons וְאֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> and his brethren שְׁנֵ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָֽׂר׃ <S%H6240><s%> ten

הַחֲמִישִׁ֣י <S%H2549><s%> The fifth נְתַנְיָ֔הוּ <S%H5418><s%> to Nethaniah בָּנָ֥יו <S%H1121><s%> [he] his sons וְאֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> and his brethren שְׁנֵ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָֽׂר׃ <S%H6240><s%> ten

הַשִּׁשִּׁ֣י <S%H8345><s%> The sixth בֻקִּיָּ֔הוּ <S%H1232><s%> to Bukkiah בָּנָ֥יו <S%H1121><s%> [he] his sons וְאֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> and his brethren שְׁנֵ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָֽׂר׃ <S%H6240><s%> ten

הַשְּׁבִעִ֣י <S%H7637><s%> The seventh יְשַׂרְאֵ֔לָה <S%H3480><s%> to Jesharelah בָּנָ֥יו <S%H1121><s%> [he] his sons וְאֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> and his brethren שְׁנֵ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָֽׂר׃ <S%H6240><s%> ten

הַשְּׁמִינִ֣י <S%H8066><s%> The eighth יְשַֽׁעְיָ֔הוּ <S%H3470><s%> to Jeshaiah בָּנָ֥יו <S%H1121><s%> [he] his sons וְאֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> and his brethren שְׁנֵ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָֽׂר׃ <S%H6240><s%> ten

הַתְּשִׁיעִ֣י <S%H8671><s%> The ninth מַתַּנְיָ֔הוּ <S%H4983><s%> to Mattaniah בָּנָ֥יו <S%H1121><s%> [he] his sons וְאֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> and his brethren שְׁנֵ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָֽׂר׃ <S%H6240><s%> ten

הָעֲשִׂירִ֣י <S%H6224><s%> The tenth שִׁמְעִ֔י <S%H8096><s%> to Shimei בָּנָ֥יו <S%H1121><s%> [he] his sons וְאֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> and his brethren שְׁנֵ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָֽׂר׃ <S%H6240><s%> ten

עַשְׁתֵּֽי־ <S%H6249><s%> eleven עָשָׂ֣ר <S%H6240><s%> ten עֲזַרְאֵ֔ל <S%H5832><s%> to Azareel בָּנָ֥יו <S%H1121><s%> [he] his sons וְאֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> and his brethren שְׁנֵ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָֽׂר׃ <S%H6240><s%> ten

הַשְּׁנֵ֤ים <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָׂר֙ <S%H6240><s%> ten לַחֲשַׁבְיָ֔ה <S%H2811><s%> to Hashabiah בָּנָ֥יו <S%H1121><s%> [he] his sons וְאֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> and his brethren שְׁנֵ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָֽׂר׃ <S%H6240><s%> ten

לִשְׁלֹשָׁ֤ה <S%H7969><s%> three עָשָׂר֙ <S%H6240><s%> ten שֽׁוּבָאֵ֔ל <S%H7619><s%> to Shubael בָּנָ֥יו <S%H1121><s%> [he] his sons וְאֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> and his brethren שְׁנֵ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָֽׂר׃ <S%H6240><s%> ten

לְאַרְבָּעָ֤ה <S%H702><s%> four עָשָׂר֙ <S%H6240><s%> teen מַתִּתְיָ֔הוּ <S%H4993><s%> to Mattithiah בָּנָ֥יו <S%H1121><s%> [he] his sons וְאֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> and his brethren שְׁנֵ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָֽׂר׃ <S%H6240><s%> ten

לַחֲמִשָּׁ֤ה <S%H2568><s%> fif עָשָׂר֙ <S%H6240><s%> teen לִֽירֵמ֔וֹת <S%H3406><s%> to Jeremoth בָּנָ֥יו <S%H1121><s%> [he] his sons וְאֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> and his brethren שְׁנֵ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָֽׂר׃ <S%H6240><s%> ten

לְשִׁשָּׁ֤ה <S%H8337><s%> six עָשָׂר֙ <S%H6240><s%> teen לַחֲנַנְיָ֔הוּ <S%H2608><s%> to Hananiah בָּנָ֥יו <S%H1121><s%> [he] his sons וְאֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> and his brethren שְׁנֵ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָֽׂר׃ <S%H6240><s%> ten

לְשִׁבְעָ֤ה <S%H7651><s%> seven עָשָׂר֙ <S%H6240><s%> teen לְיָשְׁבְּקָ֔שָׁה <S%H3436><s%> to Joshbekashah בָּנָ֥יו <S%H1121><s%> [he] his sons וְאֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> and his brethren שְׁנֵ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָֽׂר׃ <S%H6240><s%> ten

לִשְׁמוֹנָ֤ה <S%H8083><s%> eight עָשָׂר֙ <S%H6240><s%> teen לַחֲנָ֔נִי <S%H2607><s%> to Hanani בָּנָ֥יו <S%H1121><s%> [he] his sons וְאֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> and his brethren שְׁנֵ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָֽׂר׃ <S%H6240><s%> ten

לְתִשְׁעָ֤ה <S%H8672><s%> nine עָשָׂר֙ <S%H6240><s%> teen לְמַלּ֔וֹתִי <S%H4413><s%> to Mallothi בָּנָ֥יו <S%H1121><s%> [he] his sons וְאֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> and his brethren שְׁנֵ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָֽׂר׃ <S%H6240><s%> ten

לְעֶשְׂרִים֙ <S%H6242><s%> The twentieth לֶֽאֱלִיָּ֔תָה <S%H448><s%> to Eliathah בָּנָ֥יו <S%H1121><s%> [he] his sons וְאֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> and his brethren שְׁנֵ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָֽׂר׃ <S%H6240><s%> ten

לְאֶחָ֤ד <S%H259><s%> The one וְעֶשְׂרִים֙ <S%H6242><s%> and twentieth לְהוֹתִ֔יר <S%H1956><s%> to Hothir בָּנָ֥יו <S%H1121><s%> [he] his sons וְאֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> and his brethren שְׁנֵ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָֽׂר׃ <S%H6240><s%> ten

לִשְׁנַ֤יִם <S%H8147><s%> The two וְעֶשְׂרִים֙ <S%H6242><s%> and twentieth לְגִדַּ֔לְתִּי <S%H1437><s%> to Giddalti בָּנָ֥יו <S%H1121><s%> [he] his sons וְאֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> and his brethren שְׁנֵ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָֽׂר׃ <S%H6240><s%> ten

לִשְׁלֹשָׁ֤ה <S%H7969><s%> The three וְעֶשְׂרִים֙ <S%H6242><s%> and twentieth לְמַ֣חֲזִיא֔וֹת <S%H4238><s%> to Mahazioth בָּנָ֥יו <S%H1121><s%> [he] his sons וְאֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> and his brethren שְׁנֵ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָֽׂר׃ <S%H6240><s%> ten

לְאַרְבָּעָ֤ה <S%H702><s%> The four וְעֶשְׂרִים֙ <S%H6242><s%> and twentieth לְרוֹמַ֣מְתִּי עָ֔זֶר <S%H7320><s%> to Romamtiezer בָּנָ֥יו <S%H1121><s%> [he] his sons וְאֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> and his brethren שְׁנֵ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָֽׂר׃ <S%H6240><s%> ten פ
